This keeps options open for future turns and potentially moves closer to switches or coins in later moves. 

Thus, I will execute the action to move left.

``` Action:1 ```
Moving left will keep the avatar in a safe space while exploring the surroundings further and opening up the path for potential interactions with switches or the collection of coins in future turns.
